to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: You become a mind reader and a fortune teller.
sentences.chinese: 你變成了一個揣摩別人心思的人，一個算命先生。

sentences.english: A fortune - teller flimflamed her out of her savings.
sentences.chinese: 一個算命的將她的積蓄騙光了。

sentences.english: Drawing up other's horoscope is his job.
Now that people are no longer superstitious , fortune-telling as a profession is finished.
sentences.chinese: 現在的人都不迷信了，因此算命這一行就算完了。

sentences.english: Have not heard a word " fortune-telling rich burn incense and poor, " saying it?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有聽過一句話“窮算命富燒香”這句話呀？

sentences.english: He told her parents that the girl had a noble fate and a very promising future.
sentences.chinese: 甄夫人非常相信，請他逐一爲自己兒女看相算命。

sentences.english: One said that, when he was young, a fortune-teller predicted.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個說，他年輕時，一個替人算命的人曾預言。

sentences.english: Did you believe what the fortuneteller said?
sentences.chinese: 你相信算命的人說的話嗎？

sentences.english: Each cafe has a distinct fortune-telling method.
sentences.chinese: 每家咖啡館都有其獨特的算命方式。

sentences.english: Excuse for missing the next day, the belt zishu emphasize people jewelry, grabbed a fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，子書帶人藉口丟失珠寶，抓了算命先生。

sentences.english: You really should break the habit of reading your horoscope every day, before it's too late.
sentences.chinese: 你得改掉這個每天都算命的習慣，亡羊補牢爲時未晚。

sentences.english: China’s fortune-tellers now have fresh competition.
sentences.chinese: 中國的算命先生現在有了新的競爭。

sentences.english: I wrote my birth time on a piece of paper and handed it to the fortune-teller.
sentences.chinese: 我把生辰八字寫在一張紙上，交給了算命先生。

sentences.english: A: Don't tell me she's been listening to the fortune-teller again.
sentences.chinese: 別跟我說她又聽算命的話了。

sentences.english: What did the fortune-teller do after the writer had given her some money?
sentences.chinese: 作者給了算命人一些錢後，算命人做了什麼？

definition: fortune telling
fortune-teller
to tell fortune by reading the subject's facial features
to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
fortune telling based on the subject's face
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
physiognomy
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
to alter one's fate/to improve one's luck (e.g. by changing one's name or phone number)
sorcerer
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
fate/predestination/divinatory art
casting a couple's fortune based on their bithdates (old)
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
fortune-teller
